author: Fox News
title: Ukraine news: Major Polish cities running out of space for refugees
description: Two major Polish cities, including the country's capital of Warsaw and Krakow, its second-largest city, are running out of space for refugees.
content:
Two major Polish cities, including the country's capital of Warsaw and Krakow, its second-largest city, are running out of space for Ukrainian refugees escaping Russian attacks.
